name: genetic-py
description: A Simulator that solves optimization problems using Genetic Algorithms and shows results on charts

scripts.dist:w: yarn build -w --x64 && mv dist/GeneticPy.exe dist/GeneticPy-Portable-x64.exe && mv dist/GeneticPy-Installer.exe dist/GeneticPy-Installer-x64.exe && yarn build -w --ia32 && mv dist/GeneticPy.exe dist/GeneticPy-Portable-ia32.exe && mv dist/GeneticPy-Installer.exe dist/GeneticPy-Installer-ia32.exe

author: Hocine Abdellatif Houari <houarihocine99@gmail.com>
